```{r}
library(fpp)
library(fpp2)
library(TTR)
#Importing Dataset
library(readxl)
AirPassengers_1 <- read_excel("Documents/AirPassengers_1.xlsx")
View(AirPassengers_1)
```

```{r}
#Converting the data to a time series object
passengers_ts <- ts(AirPassengers, frequency = 12)
```

```{r}
# Splitting the data into training and testing sets
train_data <- window(passengers_ts, start = c(1958, 1), end = c(1959, 12))
test_data <- window(passengers_ts, start = c(1960, 1))
```
```{r}
naive_forecast <- naive(train_data, h = length(test_data))
accuracy_naive <- accuracy(naive_forecast, test_data)
```

```{r}
simple_avg_forecast <- meanf(train_data, h = length(test_data))
accuracy_simple_avg <- accuracy(simple_avg_forecast, test_data)
```

```{r}
ma_forecast <- ma(train_data, order = 12, h = length(test_data))
accuracy_ma <- accuracy(ma_forecast, test_data)
```

```{r}
ets_model <- ets(train_data)
ets_forecast <- forecast(ets_model, h = length(test_data))
accuracy_ets <- accuracy(ets_forecast, test_data)
```

```{r}
hw_model <- HoltWinters(train_data, seasonal = "additive")
hw_forecast <- forecast(hw_model, h = length(test_data))
accuracy_hw <- accuracy(hw_forecast, test_data)
```
